/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. A blue bus and a red car add splashes of color to the scene, hinting at the vibrancy of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
